Html:
Since Codeplex now supports it, have you considered using Git for source control? In my experience it makes it considerably simpler to manage a fork of the project, and generally to feed back patches and changes to and from the main project.

I'm not positive how well Codeplex supports things similar to Github's pull request workflow, but the last I tried working with patches in TFS in Codeplex the workflow was to upload a zip file and explain what to do with it.

[edit: I found this: https://codeplex.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Forks]

Whether or not it's appropriate may also just depend on what you want to do with the project, but I thought I'd ask. In the limited time I've been looking into this it looks like you've done a great job!

Thanks,
